label.description: Label to display for the button, and aria-label

icon.description: Icon to display, and aria-label value when label is not defined

raised.description: Creates a contained button that is elevated above the surface

unelevated.description: Creates a contained button that is flush with the surface

outlined.description: Creates an outlined button that is flush with the surface

dense.description: Makes the button text and container slightly smaller

disabled.description: Disabled buttons cannot be interacted with and have no visual interaction effect

expandContent.description: When true, the space after the label and before any trailing icon, where default slotted content is rendered, is expanded to fit the available space inside the button

fullwidth.description: When true, the button is expanded to fit the entire available space.

trailingIcon.description: When true, icon will be displayed after label
